title: VP, Engineering
content:

Our teams work every day to make vacation rental easy for everyone â€” from our owners who trust Evolve to build their business to our guests who rest easy with every stay to our Evolvers who make this difference a reality. Our values anchor our daily decisions and interactions with our customers, communities, and each other. Join our inclusive culture in one of the most rapidly-growing segments in travel. Find your home at Evolve.Why this role
Evolve is the largest tech-enabled, asset-light provider of vacation rental management services in North America and weâ€™re looking for a Vice President, Engineering to lead our growing Software Development organization and ambitious technology roadmap. Reporting to our Chief Product Development Officer, youâ€™ll partner to ensure that our long-term technology strategy and roadmap are well aligned with the company's vision and growth plans. This will require a leader to identify and excel in areas where we need to be great, while also respectfully saying â€œno'' to lower priority ideas that distract us from achieving our goals. Under your leadership, you will be growing the team quickly and will need to build a culture of accountability and operational excellence, all while having some fun along the way.
What youâ€™ll do
People Leadership
Create a clear technical vision, strategy, and leadership for existing and future products, in alignment with the company's vision
Increase Evolve's technical capacity and throughput by raising the bar in attracting, hiring, training, developing, and retaining strong engineering leaders and teammates with diverse skills and competencies
Have a strong track in developing leaders throughout the organization to influence everything from recruiting to operational excellence
Preferred experience in setting up and leading globally distributed engineering teams
Build a great tech team culture that produces results while having some fun along the way
Results Leadership
Actively collaborate with the leaders in Product Management, Experience Design, Data Science, IT, and other functions outside of technology, such as Marketing, Finance, Operations, on organizational vision, team structures, headcount planning, and resource planning in support of Evolve's business goals
Balance investment across the development of new experiences, maintenance of existing experiences, foundational infrastructure, and internal tooling
Have strong opinions and make high judgment decisions on how to prioritize features, products, and new capabilities
Quickly assess the effectiveness of system architectures and technology stack, development methodologies, and tools to run an efficient and secure software development organization
Identify technical capabilities that will help propel growth in our business by reducing complexity and improving productivity
Continuously monitor new technologies and evaluate their potential use
Design and refactor the right processes to continuously deliver value to our customers (both internally and externally), and make our engineering organization more effective and efficient in delivering business outcomes
What makes you a great fit
You have 15+ years of software development experience
You have 10+ years of experience building engineering teams from the ground up, leading and supporting 100+ engineer organizations through rapid, transformative growth
You have successfully crafted technology strategies in different setups and at different stages of growth organizations
You have the technical chops to guide your teams in technology architecture and technical design
You have the experience in setting up the right mechanisms for scaling teams and products across multiple geographies
You have a passion and demonstrated experience for cross-functional collaboration with other functions, providing support to organizational planning and execution
You have championed and supported impactful DEI efforts in an engineering leadership role
You have a growth mindset, passion for learning, and willingness to change and adapt your own perspective when collaborating with teammates from diverse perspectives and backgrounds
You have a capacity to learn and understand the effects and impact of your decisions over both short and long timeframes
You embrace and embody our Core Values
Location
We currently are able to hire throughout the U.S except in the following states: District of Columbia, Hawaii, and Pennsylvania. If you live in Colorado, you can work remotely anywhere in the state, at our downtown Denver office, or a hybrid of both!California Applicant Privacy Policy | Evolve
Compensation
 
For this role our salary range is $244,000 to $299,500, depending on relevant experience. This role will also be eligible to receive a variable annual bonus based on both company and individual performance.
Additional compensation details: 
Equity: 150% of salary equivalent RSUs
Variable comp: 25% of salary target

How we work together
With our core values as our guide, every Evolver helps shape the company we want to work for and the people we want to be. Weâ€™ve cultivated a culture of collaboration, care, and responsibility that we can all be proud of, and weâ€™re excited to see what youâ€™ll bring as your authentic self.
Still curious about who we are and what we do? Read more about our business and our culture at evolve.com.
EEO 
At Evolve, we are committed to diversity and inclusion. As an equal opportunity employer, all qualified candidates will be considered for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, age, sex or gender (including pregnancy, childbirth, lactation and related medical conditions), gender identity or gender expression, sexual orientation, marital status, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, military service or veteran status, physical or mental disability, or any other legally protected characteristic. Evolve participates in e-Verify for all positions.
If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation at any point in the hiring process, please let your recruiter know.
